infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: GreenBubble needs access to your camera to take photos of completed environmental challenges and share your progress with your bubble members.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: GreenBubble needs access to your photo library to select and upload photos of completed environmental challenges.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: GreenBubble needs permission to save photos of your completed environmental challenges to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: GreenBubble may need access to your microphone when recording videos of environmental challenges.
